summary: The nation increasingly relies on computer-based information systems to support critical infrastructure needed for communications, water, energy, and more. Much of the infrastructure is privately owned. Federal agencies have established a variety of regulations to help protect it from cyber threats. For this report, we asked a group of industry representatives for their views on federal efforts to use more consistent cybersecurity regulations. Some participants...
title: Cybersecurity Regulations: Industry Perspectives on the Impact, Progress, Challenges, and Opportunities of Harmonization
